title: Paris Fair & White Gel Creme Strong Bleaching Treatment
description:
GEL CREME
STRONG BLEACHING TREATMENT

The FAIR & WHITE Cream Gel helps solve pigmentary problems thanks to its very effective lightening ingredients. Your complexion is visibly smooth and clearer.

INSTRUCTION FOR USE : on the cleansed face, apply the FAIR & WHITE Cream Gel to the areas to be treated. Gently massage to make it penetrate. Daily use morning and evening during 3 or 6 weeks at least.

INGREDIENTS : Aqua (Water), Paraffinum Liquidum (Mineral Oil), Butylene Glycol, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Cetyl Alcohol, Ceteareth-20, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut Oil), Kojic Acid, Saxifraga Sermentosa (Saxifraga Extract), Vitis Vinifera (Grape Extract), Morus Bombycis (Mulberry Extract), Scutellaria Baicalensis (Scutellaria Root Extract), EDTA, Titanium Dioxyde, Dimethicone, Propylparaben, Butylparaben, BHA, Fragrance (Parfum).

SIZE : 30 ml / 1oz

title: Fair & White Exclusive Gel Creme Whitenizer #08003
description: Discover the advanced formula of the FAIR & WHITE EXCLUSIVE Cream-gel. Its new complex offers an ultra-effective whitening system. As from day 7, your skin is smoother, clearer and beautifully radiant.
